import React from "react"; import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade"; import InputText from "elements/Form/InputText"; export default function BookingInformation(props) { const { data, ItemDetails, checkout } = this.props; return (
{ItemDetails.name}
{ItemDetails.city}, {ItemDetails.country}
${+checkout.duration * ItemDetails.price} USD per {" "} {checkout.duration} {ItemDetails.unit}{" "} {+checkout.duration > 1 ? "s" : ""}
); }
